maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.orig: Blue-haired Spheromancer! You're not thinking about skipping the duel, right?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.text: Spheromanceuse aux cheveux bleus ! J'espère que tu n'as pas l'intention de sauter ce duel, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.orig: Are you ready for the Faj'ro Temple race?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.text: Est-ce que tu es prête pour la course du \v[area.heat-dng.name] ?
À vos marques tout le monde !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.orig: Complete \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0] in the race against Emilie and C'tron.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.text: Terminez le \c[3]\v[area.heat-dng.name]\c[0] dans la course contre Emilie et C'tron.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.orig: D'accord, just don't let us wait for too long~
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.text: D'accord, mais ne nous fais pas attendre trop longtemps~

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.orig: Hey Lea, we should call C'tron before entering the Temple.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.text: Hé, Lea, on devrait appeler C'tron avant d'entrer dans le temple.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.orig: Don't forget about our race, non?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.text: Tu n'as pas oublié pour notre course, non ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.orig: Lea, what about Emilie? We wanted to race the dungeon together, right?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.text: Lea, et pour Emilie ? On voulait faire la course au donjon ensemble, non ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.orig: Lea, what about that dungeon race? You were planning to enter the dungeon together with Emilie and C'tron, right?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/18/.text: Lea, tu as pensé à la course ? Tu voulais entrer dans le donjon avec Emilie et C'tron, correct ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: I see your stats are \c[1]as high as ever\c[0].
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Je vois que tes stats \c[1]restent toujours aussi élevées\c[0].

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Hm...\. Your \c[3]stats seem rather low\c[0]. I suggest you upgrade your \c[3]circuits\c[0] and \c[3]equipment\c[0] before the duel.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Hm...\. Tes \c[3]stats semblent assez faibles\c[0]. Je te conseille d'améliorer tes \c[3]circuits\c[0] et tes \c[3]équipements\c[0] avant le duel.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Unless you are very confident in your skills. But I don't want to hear any excuses!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Sauf si tu es bien sûre de ce que tu fais. Mais je ne veux pas entendre d'excuses !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: I see you are prepared.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Je vois que tu t'es préparée.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Are you ready for the duel?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Es-tu prête pour le duel ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Alright then, let's go!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Bon, Alors, c'est parti !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Well then... good luck!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Bon alors... bonne chance !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Make sure to give Grasshead the beating of a lifetime.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Assure-toi de mettre à cette Tête-d'Herbe la raclée de sa vie !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Hey Lea, I think Tronny wanted to watch your match as well, non?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Hé, Lea ! Je crois que Tronny voulais aussi regarder le duel, non ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: I'll quickly give him a call to come over!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Je vais l'appeler rapidement pour qu'il vienne !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Lea, I think Emilie wanted to see the match as well, right?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Lea, je pense que Emilie voulait aussi voir le duel, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Let me just quickly call her!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Laisse-moi l'appeler rapidos !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Lea, I think C'tron and Emilie wanted to watch your match as well, right?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Lea, je pense que C'tron et Emilie voulaient tous les deux regarder ton duel, non ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Just give them a hint via D-Link.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Appelle-les vite avec un D-Link.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Here we are!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Nous y voilà !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: It's duel time! Good thing you didn't forget about us!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Pile à l'heure ! Une bonne chose que tu nous aies pas oubliés !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: It's duel time! Good thing you didn't forget about me.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Pile à l'heure ! Une bonne chose que tu m'aies pas oublié !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Gosh...\. I almost missed it.\. Thanks for telling me!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Oh...\. J'ai failli rater ça.\. Merci pour me l'avoir dit !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: I surely hope you learned your lessons since last.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: J'espère vraiment que tu as appris ta leçon depuis la dernière fois.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Or do you plan to once again turn this into a display of \c[1]BLATANT CHEATING\c[0] in front of everyone?!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: À moins que tu comptes encore montrer devant tout le monde tes \c[1]TRICHERIES SCANDALEUSES\c[0] ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: I won't let you get away so easily this time.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Cette fois, je ne vais pas te laisser t'en sortir aussi facilement.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Inviting your friend to watch the duel, Spheromancer?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Tu invites tes amis pour qu'ils regardent le duel ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Pretty confident!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: C'est que tu es vraiment sûre de toi, Spheromanceuse !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Anyway, let's get things started!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Peu importe, commençons !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Are you ready?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Tu es prête ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Good.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Bien.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: PvP Combat, ACTIVATE!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Combat PvP, ACTIVATION !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Smash him good, Lea!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Taille-lui bien son costume, Lea !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Good Luck, Lea!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Bonne chance, Lea !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Time has passed since our last duel.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Du temps s'est écoulé depuis notre dernier duel.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Our characters have grown.\. We both acquired the \c[3]heat element\c[0].
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Nous nous sommes améliorés.\. Nous avons tous les deux obtenu l'\c[3]élément chaud\c[0].

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: So it is time for me, \c[3]Apollo\c[0], to make sure you are still on the right path.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Il est temps pour moi, \c[3]Apollo\c[0], de m'assurer que tu te trouves toujours sur le droit chemin.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig:
The path of a 
proper Spheromancer!\.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Le chemin d'un véritable Spheromancer !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Mon dieu, start the duel already!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Mon dieu, tu vas finir par le commencer, ce duel ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: THE PATH...\.\. of \c[3]Justice\c[0]!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: LE CHEMIN...\.\. de la \c[3]Justice\c[0] !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: Let the duel begin!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: Que le duel, commence !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: [yes]
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: [oui]

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.orig: [no]
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/449.text: [non]

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: W-WHAT IS THIS DAMAGE?!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: C-C'EST QUOI CES DÉGÂTS ?!

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: YOU'RE DOING IT AGAIN!\. YOU LEARNED NOTHING!!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: TU RECOMMENCES ENCORE !\. TU N'AS RIEN APPRIS DU TOUT !!

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: Not bad. But that was just a "warm up". Things are getting \c[3]hot\c[0] now!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: Pas mal. Mais c'était juste un "échauffement". Ça va \c[3]chauffer\c[0] maintenant !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: Did you seriously just make that pun?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: Tu viens vraiment de sortir cette blague ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: YOU DIRTY LITTLE CHEATER!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: ESPÈCE DE SALE PETITE TRICHEUSE !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: Let's see if you can handle my \c[3]secret strategy\c[0]!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: Voyons voir comment tu t'en sors avec ma \c[3]stratégie secrète\c[0] !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: AHHHHHHHHHH!!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: AHHHHHHHHHH !!

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: You can hardly call that a duel, really...
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: On peut difficilement appeler ça un duel...

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: Alright, fun time is over now.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: Bon, fini de jouer maintenant.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: NO \c[1]SKILLS\c[0], NO \c[1]HONOR\c[0]! ONLY \c[1]DIRTY TRICKS\c[0]!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: AUCUN \c[1]TALENT\c[0], AUCUN \c[1]HONNEUR\c[0], SEULEMENT DES \c[1]COUPS BAS\c[0] !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: One more hit and he'll shut up, Lea!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: Encore un coup et il sera par terre, Lea !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: This isn't over yet!!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: Ce n'est pas encore fini !!

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: You almost got it, Lea! Go, go, go!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: T'y es presque, Lea ! Go, go, go !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: Again with just a single hit?\. And here I thought you would have worked on your defense by now.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: T'es encore tombée en un coup ?\. Et moi qui pensais que tu aurais travaillé ta défense depuis.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: Down with just a single hit?!\. You should really mind your defensive stats.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: T'es tombée en un coup ?!\. Tu devrais vraiment t'occuper de ta défense.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: I won't let you win this easily!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: Je ne vais pas te laisser gagner aussi facilement !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: I know you can do better.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: Je sais que tu peux faire mieux.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: Come on, Lea! More punching! You can do it!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: Allez, Lea ! Frappe-le, comme un sac de sable ! Tu peux le faire !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: This is too easy, really...
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: C'est vraiment trop facile...

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: You still have much to learn!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: Tu as encore beaucoup à apprendre !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: Don't give up, Lea!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: N'abandonne pas, Lea !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.orig: Alright. Time to end this!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/450.text: Bon ! Il est temps d'en finir !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: ONCE A CHEATER, FOREVER A CHEATER!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: TRICHEUSE UNE FOIS, TRICHEUSE POUR TOUJOURS !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: YOU REALLY LEARNED NOTHING!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: TU N'AS VRAIMENT RIEN APPRIS !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: YOU CHEATER!\. YOU DIRTY LITTLE CHEATER!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: TRICHEUSE !\. ESPÈCE DE SALE PETITE TRICHEUSE !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: THERE WAS ABSOLUTELY NO HONOR IN THIS DUEL!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: IL N'Y AVAIT STRICTEMENT AUCUN HONNEUR DANS CE DUEL !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Blue-haired Spheromancer, I'm severely disappointed!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Spheromanceuse aux cheveux bleus, je suis extrêmement déçu !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: You've grown remarkably. I'm very impressed, Spheromancer!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Tu as remarquablement progressé. Je suis très impressionné, Spheromancer !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Lea.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Lea.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Don't forget your promise.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: N'oublie pas ta promesse.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: SHE CHEATED!!\. WHY SHOULD I CARE?!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: QU'EST-CE QUE J'EN AI A FAIRE ?!\. ELLE A TRICHÉ !!

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: She won the duel, that's all you agreed on.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Elle a gagné le duel, vous vous étiez mis d'accord là-dessus.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: ... Right.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: ... Oui.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: You deserve to be called by your proper name now.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Tu mérites bien d'être appelée par ton vrai nom maintenant.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: You are really severally lacking in \c[1]stamina\c[0], being defeated so quickly...
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Tu manques sérieusement d'\c[1]endurance\c[0], pour être vaincu aussi rapidement...

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: It looks like you still have much to learn, Blue-Haired Spheromancer.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: On dirait que tu as encore beaucoup à apprendre, Spheromanceuse aux cheveux bleus.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: You still won't use her name? Don't be like that.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Tu ne veux toujours pas l'appeler par son nom ? Ne sois pas comme ça.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Well, it seems at least that you didn't entirely rely on blatant cheating this time.\. I respect this.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Bon, au moins, cette fois, au moins, tu n'as pas compté uniquement sur de la tricherie honteuse.\. Je respecte ça.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: It was a good duel and a respectable effort on your end.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: C'était un bon duel et tu as fait un travail respectable.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: I suppose I might as well use your proper name.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Donc je pense que je peux t'appeler par ton véritable nom.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: SPHEROMANCER LEA!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: SPHEROMANCER LEA !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: AS ANOTHER SPHEROMANCER, I URGE YOU TO STOP THIS DISGRACEFUL BEHAVIOR!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: EN TANT QUE SPHEROMANCER COMME TOI, JE T'IMPLORE D'ARRÊTER CE COMPORTEMENT HONTEUX !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: I shall give you another chance with our next duel to reconsider your current course.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Je vais, pour notre prochain duel, te donner encore une autre chance, pour que tu reconsidères la direction que tu prends !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Spheromancer Lea! I'm looking forward to our next duel!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Spheromancer Lea ! Je suis déjà impatient de pouvoir faire notre prochain duel !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Does that mean we can finally play this game together like we'd originally planned?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Est-ce que ça veut dire qu'on va enfin pouvoir jouer au jeu comme ce qu'on avait prévu ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Yes, sorry I made you wait.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Oui, désolé de t'avoir fait attendre.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: About time. Let's go.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Il était temps. Allons-y.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Until next time, Spheromancer Lea!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: À la prochaine, Spheromancer Lea !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Bye!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Bye !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Congratulations! That was really...\. \c[1]one-sided\c[0].
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Félicitations ! C'était très...\. \c[1]inéquitable\c[0].

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Congratulations! That was really impressive!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Félicitations ! C'était vraiment impressionnant !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Oui! You've shown Grasshead who's boss! Good work!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Oui ! T'as bien montré à Tête-d'Herbe qui était le patron !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: That was a good fight, Lea.\. You tried your best.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: C'était un beau combat, Lea.\. Tu as fait de ton mieux.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Oui.\. Just make sure to punch Grasshead even harder next time!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Oui.\. Mais la prochaine fois, faudra cogner Tête-d'Herbe plus fort !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Well then...\. Our next stage would be \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0], right?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Bon, alors...\. Notre prochaine étape devrait être le \c[3]\v[area.heat-dng.name]\c[0], c'est ça ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Exactement!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Exactement !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: It's time for our third dungeon race!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Il est temps de faire notre troisième course au donjon !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Oh, you two are racing dungeons together?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Oh, vous deux vous faites des courses dans les donjons ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: That's right! We've been racing dungeons ever since we met at Newcomer's Bridge.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: C'est ça ! On court les donjons depuis qu'on s'est rencontré sur le Pont des Nouveaux Arrivants.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Oh, that sounds fun...
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Oh, ça a l'air fun...

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Then again, I guess there is no place for me in your competition...
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Mais sinon, j'imagine qu'il n'y a pas de place pour moi dans votre compétition...

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: What do you mean, Tronny? Of course you can race with us!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Qu'est-ce que tu veux dire, Tronny ? Bien sûr que tu peux courir avec nous !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: The more the merrier, right Lea?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Plus on est de fou, plus on rit, n'est-ce pas, Lea ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Now if that's the case! Don't mind me joining, then!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Bon alors si c'est ça, je veux bien participer !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Fantastique! Now I really can't wait!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Fantastique ! Là j'en peux plus d'attendre !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Hm.. maybe Lea wants a short breather after the duel?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Hum... Peut-être que Lea veut souffler un peu après son duel ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Ah oui... just tell us when you're ready!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Ah oui... Dis-le-nous quand c'est bon pour toi !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.orig: Enter \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0] to start the next dungeon race again Emilie and C'tron!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/451.text: Entrez dans le \c[3]\v[area.heat-dng.name]\c[0], pour commencer la course contre Emilie et C'tron !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/457.text: Je vois que tu es arrivée !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/457.orig: Once again, the location is just perfect!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/457.text: Encore une fois, ce lieu à l'air d'être fait pour ça !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/457.orig: Again seeking the attention of other players, oui?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/457.text: Toujours à vouloir attirer l'attention des autres joueurs, oui ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/457.orig: Are you sure?\. With all those players around?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/457.text: Tu es sûr ?\. Avec autant de joueurs autour ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/457.orig: He wants his audience. You can't talk him out of it, trust me.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/457.text: Il veut son public. On peut pas lui enlever ça, crois-moi.
Peu importe !\. Dis-le-moi lorsque tu es prête pour le duel !
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/457.orig: Anyway!\. Talk to me when you are ready for the duel!

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.orig: Hey Lea! You're here as well? I just arrived myself.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.text: Hé Lea ! Tu es déjà là toi aussi ? Je viens juste d'arriver.
Attends, je suis dernière ? Oh nooon~

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.orig: ... But this is not the end of the dungeon, oui?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.text: ... Mais ce n'est pas la fin du donjon, oui ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.orig: No, this seems to be more like a break room in the middle?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.text: Non, on dirait plus une sorte de salle de repos au milieu...

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.orig: Phew... that means the race isn't over yet!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.text: Pfiou... Donc ça veut dire que la course n'est pas finie !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.orig: Oh, you're here as well already?\. Tronny and I just arrived.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.text: Oh, tu es là toi aussi ?\. Tronny et moi on vient juste d'arriver.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.orig: And he even arrived before me, can you believe this?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.text: Et il est même arrivé avant moi. T'imagines ça ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.orig: Anyway, this is not the end of the dungeon, just the middle.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.text: En tout cas, ce n'est pas la fin du donjon, juste le milieu.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.orig: But man... this dungeon sure is full of puzzles.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.text: Mais pfff... Ce donjon est vraiment rempli de puzzles.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.orig: I mean we could take a break. There is a landmark here, after all.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.text: Je veux dire, on peut se reposer un peu, il y a bien un point de repère ici, après tout.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.orig: We'll leave it up to you, Lea. Just enter the dungeon when you want to continue the race.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/491.text: On te laisse choisir, Lea. Retourne juste dans le donjon pour continuer la course.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/495.orig: You think this temple will be as long as the last one...?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/495.text: Tu crois que ce temple sera aussi long que celui d'avant ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/495.orig: I heard there is a landmark somewhere in the middle, so it's easy to leave and return if you need a break.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/495.text: À ce qui parait il y a un point de repère au milieu, du coup on peut partir et revenir pour faire une pause.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/495.orig: Well... it's not like leaving and returning to the previous temple was that hard either.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/495.text: Oui bon... c'est pas comme si partir et revenir dans l'ancien donjon était difficile.

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/496.orig: Really? Did ya finally get yerself a new weapon?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/496.text: Vraiment ? T'as enfin pris une nouvelle arme ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/496.orig: Ya still have yer \c[3]\v[item.57.name]\c[0], don't ya?
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/496.text: Laisse-moi deviner, t'as encore ton \c[3]\v[item.57.name]\c[0], c'est ça ?

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/496.orig: It has HP regeneration! It's super useful!
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/496.text: Il a de la régénération d'HP ! C'est super utile !

maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/496.orig: It's a level 13 weapon, for crying out loud! It's dragging ya back more than it helps.
maps/heat/dng-exterior.json/entities/496.text: C'est une arme de niveau 13 bon sang ! Elle te limite plus qu'elle ne t'aide.
